metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5336 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the survey module inMoodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.11, 2.8.x before 2.8.9, and 2.9.xbefore 2.9.3 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML by leveraging the student role and entering a crafted surveyanswer.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
